name: Snappay
description: A mobile POS System for smartphones
overview:
Snappay instantly turns any smartphone into a fully functional POS machine. No crazy fees, no additional hardware - enjoy our famous 5 minute signup today and immediately begin accepting payment!

So it’s with great pride that we announce that Snappay is now live and available at both the iTunes Store and the Android Market for free downloads right now. And since we’re using PayPal for processing, Snappay can easily be used by merchants in the United States and Canada and can also be used internationally.

Right now we’re focused primarily on our merchant customer experience – we want to know in the worst way – what you think of the Snappay merchant experience? What issues did you have if any and what were they? Let us know…to help make a great product even better!

So remember – Snappay is cool card scanning technology coupled with patent pending technology that alleviates consumer fear, and with no additional hardware this means that Snappay has a 5 minute signup and you get your money instantly!
